20110109140500.000|20110109140503.000|CC1|10:00 A.M. OUTSIDE THIS SAFEWAY 
20110109140503.000|20110109140504.000|CC1|IN TUCSON, ARIZONA, 22-YEAR-OLD 
20110109140504.000|20110109140506.000|CC1|JARED LEE LOUGHNER ALLEGEDLY

20110109141204.000|20110109141206.000|CC1|YOUNG MAN WHO APPARENTLY

20110109141208.000|20110109141209.000|CC1|ACCOMPLICE MAY STILL BE ON THE  
20110109141209.000|20110109141213.000|CC1|LOOSE.                          
20110109141213.000|20110109141214.000|CC1|BY ALL ACCOUNTS, 22-YEAR-OLD    
20110109141214.000|20110109141215.000|CC1|JARED LEE LOUGHNER WAS A        
20110109141215.000|20110109141217.000|CC1|TROUBLED YOUNG MAN.             
20110109141217.000|20110109141219.000|CC1|WHAT AUTHORITIES BELIEVE IS     
20110109141219.000|20110109141221.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S MYSPACE PAGE SUGGESTS
20110109141221.000|20110109141221.000|CC1|HE HAD BEEN PREPARING FOR A     
20110109141221.000|20110109141224.000|CC1|MURDEROUS RAMPAGE.              
20110109141224.000|20110109141225.000|CC1|A FEW HOURS BEFORE THE SHOOTINGS
20110109141225.000|20110109141227.000|CC1|HE ALLEGEDLY WROTE A MESSAGE    
20110109141227.000|20110109141228.000|CC1|ENTITLED "GOOD-BYE, FRIENDS."   
20110109141228.000|20110109141230.000|CC1|IT BEGINS "DEAR FRIENDS, PLEASE 
20110109141230.000|20110109141233.000|CC1|DON'T BE MAD AT ME."            
20110109141233.000|20110109141235.000|CC1|EYEWITNESSES SAY LOUGHNER WAS
